portal.forgotPassword.instructions.text: You will receive instructions email shortly to reset your password.
portal.forgotPassword.enterEmail.text: Enter your email address to receive instructions to reset your password.
portal.linkExpired.title: Link Expired
portal.linkExpired.definition.text: This password reset link has expired.
portal.linkExpired.instructions.text: Please contact your administrator, or enter your username o request a new link.
portal.linkExpired.submitted.text: A new reset-token link has been send.
